section.title: Nondifferentiability
section.p: A function is said to be nondifferentiable at any value its first derivative is undefined. There are three graphical behaviors that lead to non-differentiability.

ul.li: f is nondifferentiable at a if f is discontinuous at a.
f is nondifferentiable at a if the slope of f is different from the left and right at a.
f is nondifferentiable at a if f has a vertical tangent line at a.
